questions.question: If you have 8 distinct objects, in how many ways can you arrange 3 of them in a row?
How many different committees of 3 people can be formed from a group of 7 people?
How many ways can you distribute 5 distinct prizes to 8 students if each student can receive at most one prize?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word 'MATHEMATICS' be arranged?
How many different 4-digit numbers can be formed using the digits 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 if each digit can be used only once?
